name: The Journey
description:
The beauty of a journey. Start with a footstep. follow with other.
closer to where you'd be. every moment is worthy.

A just king of minangkabau lore "Cindua Mato"

3508x
This is meant to be my graphic novel cover of 'Cindua Mato' Project. A cultural project to introduce folklore of my people to the world. however we can't find investors to make the project come true.

But if this is sold here I will reconsider to continue painting the graphic novel with my team of 3 artist. we'll mint some panels along the to pay for our production expenses
